description: Mallow likes Grass type Pokémon. She`s an active girl who`s also a bit of a scatterbrain. She helps out at the Aina Cafeteria her family runs by attracting customers to come in and eat. She is also a student at the Pokémon School on Melemele Island. She showed Ash around the campus on his first day and introduced him to Samson Oak.
name: Mao
